title: AddGraph
description:
AddGraph is a JavaScript, Simple to use, powerful editor for general graph diagramming.  AddGraph is faster in adding nodes and lines. Nodes can be resized, icons can be customized, icon colors, border colors, and title colors can be changed.
AddGraph can be used as a data visualization tool. Currently, it provides three different layout methods: Force layout, Circular layout, Horizontal Tree Layout, Vertical Tree Layout, and Rectangular layout.
